headlines.description: — Manchester City's 4-1 rout of Liverpool on Saturday was marred by more off-field trouble as one of English soccer's fiercest rivalries turned...
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City vs. Liverpool turns toxic again after 4-1 rout

headlines.description: Marcus Tavernier and Dominick Solanke were both on target as Bournemouth earned a vital 2-1 win over high-flying Fulham on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth out of relegation zone with 2-1 win over Fulham

headlines.description: Gabriel Jesus scored his first goals for six months as Arsenal maintained control of the Premier League title race with a 4-1 defeat of Leeds.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gabriel Jesus scores twice as Arsenal power on

headlines.description: Brighton & Hove Albion midfielder Alexis Mac Allister fired home a 90th-minute penalty to snatch a 3-3 draw for his side against Brentford.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brighton, Brentford share points in six-goal thriller

headlines.description: Crystal Palace earned its first victory of 2023 after Jean-Philippe Mateta’s stoppage-time strike gave Roy Hodgson’s team a 2-1 win over Leicester on Saturday in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hodgson’s Palace halts slide, beats Leicester on late winner

headlines.description: Nottingham Forest were denied a win in their bid to stay out of the relegation zone as Daniel Podence struck a late equaliser for Wolves.
headlines.shortLinkText: Podence leveller earns Wolves a point at Forest

headlines.description: Goals from  Ollie Watkins and captain John McGinn earned Aston Villa all three points in a 2-0 Premier League win at Chelsea.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea slip into PL's bottom half with loss to Villa
